item.description:
The Boston Sports Blogapalooza takes place Sunday, March 28 at 12 noon to 6:00 pm at Jerry Remy's new Sports Bar.

Social Media Outlets for Sports bloggers will meet, trade social media tips, and talk shop in a fun, relaxed atmosphere. The Boston media, local companies and the music folks will also participate.

Media of both types (social and traditional) will mingle and discuss all of the hot topics on the Boston Sports scene.

Local companies will network with bloggers about their products and services. Partnerships between these companies and social media outlets will be agreed upon right at the event.

More information is available at www.bostonsportsblogapalooza.com
item.name: Boston Sports Blogapalooza DATE & LOCATION CHANGE
